requestBody.description: This API is to be used to start min KYC for a wallet by doing an OTP.
This API can be used to check if a vehicle is registed and if it is active on NPCI.
This API is to be used to validate the OTP received by the customer.
This API can be used to create a wallet, add a tag and assign a tag to a vehicle.
This API can be used to activate, deactivate or close a tag
This API is used to check the actual status of the recharge.
This API can be used to reissue a damaged/lost tag
This API can be used to check if a customer already exists in Axis database
This API is used to perform a recharge.
This API should be polled to see if wallet creation is successful.
This API gives details about balance of a wallet.
Get a list of transactions against a wallet.

limit.description: the number of results to limit in this query. Max is 100

endDate.description: The end date you want filter by in YYYY-MM-DD

startDate.description: The start date you want to filter by YYYY-MM-DD

otpReferenceId.description: The reference ID to be used while submitting the OTP

walletId.description: The reference ID that was given in the response of generate OTP API

odBalance.description: Overdraft balance. If you have 200 rupee balance and you do a 300 rupee toll txn, your OD balance 100. On recharge this amount is recovered first.

unclearBalance.description: When you do recharge, money first goes into unclear balance. Once it is reconciled, it will be added to the wallet balance.

thresholdAmount.description: Balance below which tags will be put in low balance in NPCI mapper.

pinCode.description: The pin code of the customer

address.description: The customer address. if `tagDetails.toBeShippedByBank` is `true`, tag would be shipped here.

class.description:
the vehicle class
- 4 - 	Car / Jeep / Van/ Tata Ace and similar mini light commercial vehicle
- 5	- Light Commercial Vehicle
- 6	- Three Axle Commerical Vehile
- 7	- Bus/Truck
- 12 -	4 to 6 Axle
- 15 -	7 or more Axle
- 16 - 	Heavy Construction Machinery (HCM) / Earth Moving Equipment (EME)

number.description: Vehicle number in all capitals, no spaces. eg - `KA12AB5618`

chasisNumber.description: The chasis number of the vehicle

gender.description: the gender of the customer. `M` and `F`

number.description: The document ID. For example PAN or Aadhar number

document.description: The document  details. BC needs to collect these details from the user and store on their side.

sequence.description: if `toBeShippedByBank` is `false` provide the tag sequence number you already have with you. this is preprovisioned by the bank and given to you.

toBeShippedByBank.description: Should the bank be shipping the tag?

statusMessage.example: Recharge requet is submitted. Please check the status enquiry API.

walletId.description: The wallet ID to be recharged

referenceId.description: The ref ID of the txn in BC system

dob.description: date of birth of the customer

vehicleNumber.description: the vehicle number of the customer

walletId.description: If the wallet is found this would be returned

statusCode.description: the statusCode outlining the status of the API

statusMessage.example: Customer and vehicle are already registered

otpReferenceId.description: The reference ID that was given in the response of generate OTP API

statusMessage.example: Wallet/Tag is not issued by this channel

referenceId.description: The ref ID of the txn in BC system

statusMessage.example: Wallet creation in progress, check status with status enquiry API

rechargeDateTime.description: The time at which wallet balance was updated.

taxAmount.description: The tax on the issuance amount. This is fixed as preconfigured on the bank systems.

topupAmount.description: The amount to be added as the initial balance.

depositAmount.description: The deposit amount. This is fixed as preconfigured on the bank systems.

issuanceAmount.description: The issuance amount. This is fixed as preconfigured on the bank systems.

id.description: if `addToExisting` is `true`, then supply the wallet ID here

addToExisting.description: Should the new tag be added to an existing wallet

pinCode.description: The pin code of the customer

address.description: The customer address. if `tagDetails.toBeShippedByBank` is `true`, tag would be shipped here.

kycType.description: Should the wallet be created with min KYC or full KYC? Full KYC wallets enjoy higher limits but you are required to do a full KYC and follow regulatory requirements.

class.description:
the vehicle class
- 4 - 	Car / Jeep / Van/ Tata Ace and similar mini light commercial vehicle
- 5	- Light Commercial Vehicle
- 6	- Three Axle Commerical Vehile
- 7	- Bus/Truck
- 12 -	4 to 6 Axle
- 15 -	7 or more Axle
- 16 - 	Heavy Construction Machinery (HCM) / Earth Moving Equipment (EME)

number.description: Vehicle number in all capitals, no spaces. eg - `KA12AB5618`

chasisNumber.description: The chasis number of the vehicle

gender.description: the gender of the customer. `M` and `F`

number.description: The document ID. For example PAN or Aadhar number

document.description: The document  details. BC needs to collect these details from the user and store on their side.

sequence.description: if `toBeShippedByBank` is `false` provide the tag sequence number you already have with you. this is preprovisioned by the bank and given to you.

toBeShippedByBank.description: Should the bank be shipping the tag?

limit.description: the number of results to limit in this query. Max is 100

endDate.description: The end date you want filter by in YYYY-MM-DD

startDate.description: The start date you want to filter by YYYY-MM-DD

bankStatus.description: Is the vehicle active or not

npciMapperStatus.description: Is the vehicle active or not at NPCI mapper

AxisMerchantId.name: AXIS-MERCHANT-ID
AxisMerchantId.description: Provisioned by Axis assigned to channel ID

AxisClientId.name: AXIS-CLIENT-ID
AxisClientId.description: IBM Client ID of Axis API gateway

AxisSaltKey.name: AXIS-SALT-KEY
AxisSaltKey.description: Salt Key provisioned by Axis for calculating checksum

AxisProductId.name: AXIS-PRODUCT-ID
AxisProductId.description: Provisioned by Axis assigned to channel ID

AxisEncryptionKey.name: AXIS-ENCRYPTION-KEY
AxisEncryptionKey.description: Encryption Key provisioned by Axis for end to end encryption

AxisClientSecret.name: AXIS-CLIENT-SECRET
AxisClientSecret.description: IBM Client Secret of Axis API gateway

AxisPosNumber.name: AXIS-POS-NUMBER
AxisPosNumber.description: Pos Number provisioned by Axis Bank assigned to channel ID

AxisChannelId.name: AXIS-CHANNEL-ID
AxisChannelId.description: This value is provided by Axis and it represents a merchant in their system.

AxisAgentId.name: AXIS-AGENT-ID
AxisAgentId.description: Provisioned by Axis assigned to channel ID
